revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_AcolyteDie}} '''A_AcolyteDie'''
(no parameters) Sets the calling actor's render style to Normal. If the calling actor is a {{Class|AcolyteBlue|blue Acolyte}}, at least one player is alive, and there are no other living blue acolytes, it plays the sound "svox/voc14" on the VOICE channel, gives a player the {{Class|QuestItem7}} token and reads that player the LOG14 entry. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Acolyte}} and derived classes. {{DEFAULTSORT:AcolyteDie}}[[Category:Decorate Strife functions]] [[Category:Decorate Status change functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]
